name: Keyboard Krypt 3D
description:
Keyboard Krypt 3D is a text parser FPS created for the 7dfps game jam. I've had this tremendously silly idea for a while, and it was very nice to finally make a prototype of it. Is it fun? Doubtful. But to me it's pretty funny.

Tired of the sound? Type "mute"/"unmute"

Tired of dying? Use the

cheatcode gethealth
